Name: Brut de Mer
Review Text: Great service and food! Paid 70 Euros for what you see in the photos (Oyster tasting of 6, lobster roll and lobster ceviche). The gentleman serving us was very friendly and the food was delicious!

Name: Brut de Mer
Review Text: Excellent food and service. I would highly recommend ordering the king crab and octopus (pulpo) - which just blew our minds. The food was prepared simply yet skilfully, so the taste of the seafood was front and centre. By the end of the meal, we were already thinking about the dishes we'd order the next time we came here.
